function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Labor-intensive industry leading to high worker costs for compliance with SOP","Impact":"Increased financial burden on contractors, potential project delays","Mitigation":"Use of technology to automate and streamline SOP compliance processes, negotiate cost sharing with stakeholders","Technologies":"Automation software, digital reporting and tracking tools","People":"Contractors, construction workers","Owner":"Contractors, project managers"},{"Description":"Uncertain and changing situation leading to difficulty in estimating costs","Impact":"Financial instability, budget overruns, and potential project delays","Mitigation":"Periodic reassessment and adjustment of cost estimates, creating contingency plans, leveraging flexible contracts","Technologies":"Cost estimation software, risk management tools, project management software","People":"Project managers, finance managers","Owner":"Project managers, finance managers"},{"Description":"Legal costs and unexpected additional costs due to SOP compliance","Impact":"Financial strain, disputes, project delays","Mitigation":"Legal review of contracts and costs, clear communication and agreement with stakeholders, proactive risk management","Technologies":"Legal management software, communication platforms, risk assessment tools","People":"Contractors, legal teams, stakeholders","Owner":"Contractors, legal teams"}]}
